data.title: London Awesome Foundation
data.text:
Organization Type: Fundraising, Grant Making & Foundations

Address: London, Ontario

Contact: Diana

Website: https://www.facebook.com/AwesomeLondon

We are a network of people devoted to supporting awesomeness in London, ON through no-strings-attached $1000 grants. For more information also see the Awesome Foundation website
